title: Is there any music single that has sold over 20 million copies or more? - Quora

response.answer_text: From List of best-selling singles - Wikipedia: Bing Crosby "White Christmas" 1942 50 [1] Elton John "Candle in the Wind 1997" /"Something About the Way You Look Tonight" 1997 33 [1] Mungo Jerry "In the Summertime" 1970 30 [2] [3] [4] Bing Crosby "Silent Night" 1935 30 [5] Bill Haley & His Comets "Rock Around the Clock" 1954 25 [6] Whitney Houston "I Will Always Love You" 1992 20 [7] Elvis Presley "It's Now or Never" 1960 20 [5] [8] USA for Africa "We Are the World" Ed Sheeran "Shape of You" 2017 41.5 [b] [107] [108] Luis Fonsifeaturing Daddy Yankee "Despacito" 2017 36.1 [b] [107] [108] The Chainsmokersand Coldplay "Something Just like This" 2017 21.5 [b] [107] [108] Ed Sheeran "Perfect" 2017 21.4 [b] [107] [108] Wiz Khalifafeaturing Charlie Puth "See You Again" 2015 20.9 [b] [109] The Chainsmokersfeat. Halsey "Closer" 2016 20.7 [b] [110] [107] Mark Ronsonfeaturing Bruno Mars
